class.name: xbkIconBrowser
class.desc: The xbkIconBrowser Class creates a file view like look and feel tool for any xbkAPI web applications.

param.name: inst
param.comment: The name or id to be use for this xbkIconBrowser.

param.name: parent
param.comment: The parent of the xbkIconBrowser object if it has one.

method.name: addItem
method.method_desc: Adds an icon to the xbkIconBrowser.

param.name: img
param.comment: of the icon image to display.

param.name: fHandler
param.comment: A Function handler to be use by this icon.

method.name: getSelectedId
method.method_desc: Returns the id of the icon currently selected, null if none.

method.name: removeItem
method.method_desc: Remove an item from the xbkIconBrowser.

param.name: id
param.comment: id of the icon to remove.

method.name: sort
method.method_desc: Organizes all in descending alphabetical order by name.

method.name: selectIconById
method.method_desc: Select an item from the xbkIconBrowser.

param.name: id
param.comment: id of the icon to select.
